api_data.job_title: Travel Process - Undergraduates and graduates can apply

jd_information.description: Openings in Travel Process in Customer Service - Voice Process. Freshers & Experienced candidates can also apply.  Responsibilities: Will be responsible for providing customer support to clients related to reservation, ticketing and booking.Providing support on fares and charges.Receiving calls and providing the passengers with the best destinations and guiding them with the best deals.Making professional, accurate, cost effective travel arrangements for clients while providing excellent customer service.Helping clients with travel planning, business packages, vacation packages as well as travel advice & information.Selling vacation packages including flight & hotels.Making itineraries for both Domestic and International travel. Desired candidates: Qualification: Undergraduates, Graduates & 12th Pass. Job Location: Delhi / Gurgaon Shift Timings: Day / Night shifts Working Days: 5 Transportation: Yes Salary: 13,000 ctc to 28,000 ctc p.m     CONTACT US . ANY DAY BETWEEN 10 AM - 9 PM   VISHAL ---------- 9811351912    **** IMPORTANT: WE DO NOT CHARGE ANY REGISTRATION / PLACEMENT CHARGES BEFORE & AFTER YOUR JOB ****
